member.name: T:Improbable.EntityAclWriter
member.summary: EntityAclWriter is deprecated and will be removed in a future SpatialOS version. Please migrate to the simplified EntityAcl.Writer interface (but see its documentation for semantic differences).

member.name: T:Improbable.EntityAclReader
member.summary: EntityAclReader is deprecated and will be removed in a future SpatialOS version. Please migrate to the simplified EntityAcl.Reader interface (but see its documentation for semantic differences).

member.name: P:Improbable.EntityAcl.Writer.CommandReceiver
member.summary: Returns the CommandReceiver for this component.

member.name: M:Improbable.EntityAcl.Writer.Send(Improbable.EntityAcl.Update)
member.summary: Sends a component update.
member.remarks: Unlike the deprecated EntityAclWriter interface, changes made by the update are not applied to the local copy of the component (returned by the Data property) until the update is processed by the connection. Therefore, the ComponentUpdated event is not triggered immediately, but queued to be triggered at a later time. Additionally, the update will be sent even if it would have no effect on the current local copy of the component data; discarding of no-op updates should be done manually. The behaviour is undefined if the update is mutated after it is sent; use Send(update.DeepCopy()) if you intend to hold on to the update and modify it later.

member.name: M:Improbable.EntityAcl.Writer.SendAuthorityLossImminentAcknowledgement
member.summary: Sends an authority loss imminent ack for this component.

member.name: M:Improbable.EntityAcl.Writer.CopyAndSend(Improbable.EntityAcl.Update)
member.summary: Performs a deep copy and sends the copy as a component update.
member.remarks: Works exactly like Send(update), but performs a deep copy of the update before sending it. Use this method if you intend to hold on to the update and modify it later.

member.remarks: Works exactly like Send(update), but performs a deep copy of the update before sending it. Use this method if you intend to hold on to the update and modify it later.

member.name: T:Improbable.Core.RotationWriter
member.summary: RotationWriter is deprecated and will be removed in a future SpatialOS version. Please migrate to the simplified Rotation.Writer interface (but see its documentation for semantic differences).

member.name: T:Improbable.Core.RotationReader
member.summary: RotationReader is deprecated and will be removed in a future SpatialOS version. Please migrate to the simplified Rotation.Reader interface (but see its documentation for semantic differences).

member.name: P:Improbable.Core.Rotation.Writer.CommandReceiver
member.summary: Returns the CommandReceiver for this component.

member.name: M:Improbable.Core.Rotation.Writer.Send(Improbable.Core.Rotation.Update)
member.summary: Sends a component update.
member.remarks: Unlike the deprecated RotationWriter interface, changes made by the update are not applied to the local copy of the component (returned by the Data property) until the update is processed by the connection. Therefore, the ComponentUpdated event is not triggered immediately, but queued to be triggered at a later time. Additionally, the update will be sent even if it would have no effect on the current local copy of the component data; discarding of no-op updates should be done manually. The behaviour is undefined if the update is mutated after it is sent; use Send(update.DeepCopy()) if you intend to hold on to the update and modify it later.

member.summary: Sends an authority loss imminent ack for this component.
